name: Forget Me Not (WIP)
description:
Story:

Christopher Miller tries his best to handle it all. Between providing for his family, preserving his bond with his sister, and caring for his mom who has Alzheimer's- he is stretched so thin. But there comes a day when he must decide to choose one or he'll lose it all.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Forget Me Not is a game made for the I Can't Write game jam. 

Theme: Lost

For the theme, lost describes Christopher's struggle to deal with his situation. He's essentially lost on who he should choose. It also applies to Maria, his mother, who deals with Alzheimer's which progressively deteriorates brain cells and causes memory loss.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a work in progress. I have finished the first three to four days of the story, but more still remains in the story. Thanks for checking this game out!
